alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 08 at 12:54PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Gulf, southeastern Bay and southwestern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida through 130 PM EDT/1230 PM CDT/... At 1253 PM EDT/1153 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 12 miles northeast of Callaway to 8 miles southwest of Mexico Beach. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port St. Joe, Mexico Beach, Stonemill Creek, Tyndall Air Force Base, Wewahitchka, Honeyville, Allanton, Highland View, Chipola Cutoff, St Joseph State Park, Jones Homestead, Ward Ridge, White City, Overstreet, Scotts Ferry, Milltown, Davis Beach, Kinard, Broad Branch and Chipola Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Coastal Bay; Coastal Gulf; Inland Bay; Inland Gulf
